short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StockTrack.ca plugin to help find inventory Walmart, CanadianTire, BestBuy, HomeDepot, Staples and other Canadian stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a plugin to automatically add a button when browsing items on walmart.ca, canadiantire.ca, bestbuy.ca and homedepot.ca and other stores to open https://stocktrack.ca with that item.
